alert.note: Alert for Brown; Edmunds; Faulk; McPherson; Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 5:01PM MDT until May 12 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR EASTERN EDMUNDS...SOUTHWESTERN BROWN...NORTHEASTERN FAULK... SOUTHEASTERN MCPHERSON AND NORTHWESTERN SPINK COUNTIES... At 600 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Plainview Colony to near Aberdeen to Stratford, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Richmond Lake Rec Area, Long Lake Colony, Bath, Westport, Putney, Tacoma Park, Barnard, Columbia and Sand Lake Wildlife Refuge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central and northeastern South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
